* Only a single CoS can be mapped to a PGID with PFC enabled. * Strict Priority PGID with PFC enabled must have higher-priority CoS assigned to higher scheduler priorities. * DWRR PGID must have lower-priority CoS assigned than any Strict Priority PGID with PFC enabled
* PGID with PFC enabled can't have COS mapped to any of dscp-cos, dscp-tc maps
